definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 從保護兒童的總體情況來看，美國肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: Mountain flowers in the previous award and award-winning West Lake Expo a few ranking highest in the province.
sentences.chinese: 在歷次山花獎和西湖博覽會上獲獎數均居全省前茅。

sentences.english: I have also written a good essay, essay competitions among the best.
sentences.chinese: 我作文也寫的很好，徵文比賽名列前茅。

sentences.english: She has remained ahead in the class for two years.
sentences.chinese: 她在班上名列前茅已兩年了。

sentences.english: Near the top of the nutrient-dense food list are whole eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在營養素密集食品排行榜上雞蛋名列前茅。

sentences.english: He has come out in front in the study of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 他在數學方面已名列前茅。

sentences.english: Teng Zhenguo says, first temporarily, the son's achievement is in the class be among the best of candidates.
sentences.chinese: 滕振國說，初一時，兒子的成績在班裏名列前茅。

sentences.english: Apparently the Color Changing Smart Lid System has made the cut.
sentences.chinese: 隨顏色改變的智能杯蓋系統很顯然名列前茅。

sentences.english: Detection of comprehensive strength in the country's top provincial testing organizations.
sentences.chinese: 檢測綜合實力在全國省級檢測機構中名列前茅。

sentences.english: It is also easy to see why Google rates so highly as an innovator.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌在創新公司排名中位列前茅的原因也顯而易見。

sentences.english: Standard Sync system is among the best voice-command systems around.
sentences.chinese: 標準同步系統是圍繞名列前茅語音指揮系統。

sentences.english: China figures strongly, with half of the 50 places.
sentences.chinese: 中國佔了50席中的一半，名列前茅。

sentences.english: By contrast, Texas was the best state in that poll.
sentences.chinese: 相反，得克薩斯在那個排行榜上名列前茅。

sentences.english: The top five reasons hypnotists fail to achieve success.
sentences.chinese: 名列前茅五名原因催眠術師不達到成功。

sentences.english: Both producible capacity and consumptive level of Chinese soda are the first class in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國純鹼的生產能力及消費水平均名列世界前茅。

sentences.english: Others at the top of the list are family physicians, internists, and general surgeons.
sentences.chinese: 其他名列前茅的是家庭醫生，內科，普通外科醫生。

definition: to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
a long way in front/to lead by a wide margin
to stand above/to occupy an important position/to rank (among the top few)
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100

to come first in triennial palace examinations (idiom, refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand)/to be the champion/to be the very best in any field
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
